['DescriptionBvlgari Marina Lofts Next to the Bvlgari Hotel & Resorts.
Designed by The famous Italian Architect-
Antonio Citterio Patricia Viel - Harmony through Unique Architectural Style
The sophistication of an open space concept nestled at a high-end Jumeirah Bay Island, 6 Million 
sq.ft. mixed-use island developed by Meraas. Sculpted in the shape of a humungous seahorse.
you have a choice of 2,3 &4 Bedroom Loft Duplexes.
2 Beds - 4700 sq.ft. 
3 Beds - 7900 sq.ft.
4 Beds - 9000 Sq.ft. 
Features 
1) Private Elevator 
2) Maids & Drivers Room
3) Valet Parking for Guests
4) 24-Hours Concierge Service
5) Wet & Dry Kitchen Concept.
6) Terrace has provision for Plunge Pool or Jacuzzi 
7) All units have spectacular views of the Bvlgari Marina & 50 Yachts. 
The architectural language of the Bvlgari Residences is defined by the overlapping wooden terraces 
that stream along the façade interspersed with large glazed sliding doors. 
The pedestrian-only Promenade connects the Bulgari Hotel building with the Yacht Club. 
Inspired by Italian sea-side harbours like Portofino, it hosts world- class restaurants, which provide 
residents and guests with the finest culinary experiences.
Call Ritu @ +971557158502 for more details.']

title_advert: ['Brand New 6 Bed Villa in Grand Views']
descriptions:
["DescriptionAQUA Properties is pleased to present this luxurious 6-bedroom villa, located right in the heart of Dubai in Grand Views Community, Meydan. The unit boasts a built-up area of 6,044 square feet, with one bedroom located downstairs, two located on the first floor, and 3 located on the second floor. As you enter the villa, you right away get a sense of luxury as you are welcomed by high ceiling living room which is very well integrated with space for dining, along with high floor to ceiling windows, which invites natural light into the Villa. The villa has an extra family room on the first floor too, overlooking the ground floor living/dining area. Moving to the master bedroom, which includes a well-segregated study area in the room itself, walk-in wardrobe and a jacuzzi in the washroom. To making living convenient, the villas come with a built-in elevator and also a large terrace to allow for larger living.
* 6 Bedrooms
* BUA: 6,044 sq.ft.
* Plot Area: 5,891 sq.ft.
* 7 Bathrooms
* Private elevator
* Jacuzzi
* Terrace area
* Maid's room 
* Driver quarter
* Easy access to major highways
* Park views
Meydan is a well-developed community that keeps on expanding. It features a renowned Meydan Hotel, Bab Al Shams Desert Resort & Spa, The Track Meydan Golf, QUBE Sports Lounge, Meydan Tennis Academy, Dubai Equestrian Club, Emirates Equestrian Centre, Dubai Racing Club, Meydan Racecourse and much more."]

It comes featuring 2 master bedrooms, a classic living room, a family room, entrance hall, a storage room, a laundry room, a bright semi-closed style kitchen, a back garden on the courtyard that's great for unwinding at the end of a hard day.All the amenities you'll need are adjacent to you.
